title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Identify the specific subjects, features, and learning objectives for HoloLearning.

title: Design Holographic Interface and User Experience
description: Develop wireframes and interactive prototypes for the holographic user interface.

title: Develop Core Learning Content Management System
description: Create a backend system for managing learning content, including courses, lessons, and assessments.

title: Implement Interactive Learning Experiences
description: Build the frontend components that enable interactive learning experiences, such as simulations and quizzes.
dependencies: Design Holographic Interface and User Experience
Develop Core Learning Content Management System

title: Integrate Hardware and Software Components for HoloLens
description: Ensure compatibility between the HoloLearning platform and Microsoft HoloLens devices.
dependencies: Develop Core Learning Content Management System

title: Perform Functional and Accessibility Testing
description: Test the platform to ensure it meets functional requirements and is accessible for users with various abilities.
dependencies: Integrate Hardware and Software Components for HoloLens

title: Conduct Security Audit and Risk Assessment
description: Identify potential security vulnerabilities in the platform and develop mitigation strategies.
dependencies: Develop Core Learning Content Management System

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation for developers, users, and administrators on the usage and implementation of HoloLearning, including installation, configuration, troubleshooting guides, API references, and best practices.
dependencies: Integrate Hardware and Software Components for HoloLens
